column5: Anybody know how thick the ice is at verginia beach or anywere else on simcoe?
I've heard that it's about 5" around VB, there are huts out there now. But as I mentioned, it's just what I've heard (from another board).
VB follow the tracks and  walking only if the tracks end stop, don't keep going  east side of cooks bay out from glenwoods beach guys are walking out for pike and perch
Here in the bay,you need a floater suit still.
guys are walking out in certain areas.. I wont be heading out for a couple weeks... I like a good 8-10 inches before i bring out the quad
Thanks for the info. I'll probably try VB.
Oh you are so wize behind your years.
New reel! New lures from my favorite guy! New portable ice hut! Boots by the door....No appointments Tuesday! HHHHmmmm hey its time to go ice fishing! Ready or not here we come!  Lorissa
